title: Art Museum Director Semtiments on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion as seen in Surveys from 2020 and 2022
text:
load('PCA_Data.RData')
library(plotly)

Loading required package: ggplot2



Attaching package: 'plotly'


The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2':

    last_plot


The following object is masked from 'package:stats':

    filter


The following object is masked from 'package:graphics':

    layout

plot_ly(
  data = cluster_data,
  x = ~PC1,
  y = ~PC2,
  type = 'scatter',
  mode = 'markers',
  color = ~factor(kmeans_cluster_k),
  colors = c("yellowgreen", "orange", "palevioletred",  "turquoise", "indianred4"),
  text = ~paste("ID:", survey_data_2022_pca$id), 
  hoverinfo = 'text',
  marker = list(size = 8, opacity = 1)
) %>%
  layout(
    title = list(
      text = "K-means Clustering on PCA Data",
      x = 0.5,                      
      xanchor = "center"
    ),
    xaxis = list(title = "PC1"),
    yaxis = list(title = "PC2"),
    legend = list(title = list(text = "Cluster"))
  )

title: Art Museum Director Semtiments on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion as seen in Surveys from 2020 and 2022
